alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Forsyth; Guilford; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 2:54PM EDT until May 01 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Forsyth County in central North Carolina... Davidson County in central North Carolina... Randolph County in central North Carolina... Guilford County in central North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 254 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near High Point to 6 miles southeast of Thomasville to 13 miles north of Badin Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, Asheboro, Lexington, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Thomasville, Kernersville, Linwood and McLeansville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
